outputs.output_descr:
Outputs:
Regional Human Development Report on Citizen Security produced

Knowledge mapped and identified including lessons learned and good practices

Guidance notes and other Knowledge Management tools formulated to support the implementation of the Human Development Report Policy recommendations.

Regional Citizen Security Community of Practice established and actively engaged.

Re-formulation of a joint UN Agency Programme for Small Island developing States supporting ciizen security and safety through interlinked governance inititives such as anti-corruption capacity development, youth development,conflict prevention and based on governance assessments and indicator development.

Establishment of a Caribbean Accountability Peer Support Network that supports enhanced regional wide transparency and accountability initiatives and advocacy in support of implementation of reforms, regional harmonization of diverse governance programmes, citizen security, youth-led Small Island Developing States South-South cooperation initiatives.

Designing effective advocacy strategies linked to UNDP strategic areas of intervention in democratic governance.

donor_name: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)

project_descr: Caribbean capacity development in Citizen Security(CS) for 3 Eastern Caribbean Small Island Developing States (SIDS) - Antigua and Barbuda, Barbados and St. Lucia:  UNDP Barbados component of Regional Human Development Report formulation and implementati
project_title: Caribbean capacity development in citizen Security
